title: Constructive Argumentation Approach for Online Discussion-Based Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Core Language Teaching Theories and Online Discussion Tool Utilization Experience
context.additional_context: A 30-participant course for current professionals, combining Zoom-based real-time discussions and asynchronous forums to analyze language education cases and build knowledge

learning_goals: Learners can lead online discussions analyzing language education cases by applying a constructive argumentation approach.
Learners can perform collaborative knowledge-building processes with peer practitioners using a structured argumentation protocol with over 80% completion.
Learners can identify knowledge construction stages by analyzing and evaluating discussion data with the JAM model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
